original_text: Then the whole crowd of people took hold of a man called Sosthenes. He was the leader of the Jewish meeting place there. The crowd hit him with sticks in front of Gallio. But Gallio did nothing to stop them. He did not think it was important.
korean_text: 모든 사람이 회당장 소스데네를 잡아 법정 앞에서 때리되 갈리오가 이 일을 상관하지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the whole crowd of people took hold of a man called Sosthenes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 사람들의 무리 전부가 소스테네라는 한 남자를 붙잡았다.

sentences.original_text: He was the leader of the Jewish meeting place there.
The crowd hit him with sticks in front of Gallio.
sentences.korean_translation: 무리가 갈리오 앞에서 그를 막대기로 때렸다.

sentences.original_text: But Gallio did nothing to stop them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 갈리오는 그들을 막으려 하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: He did not think it was important.
